Name Surname Professor, Department of Chemistry IISER Pune

This serves as the title for the presentation 1.

Language: en

The development of efficient and sustainable chemical processes is essential in addressing the environmental challenges posed by industrial practices. This talk focuses on the pivotal role of catalysts in facilitating greener chemical reactions, particularly in the context of energy conservation and waste minimization. We will delve into recent advancements in heterogeneous and homogeneous catalysis, examining how these innovations contribute to improved reaction rates and selectivity. Special attention will be given to the design of new catalytic systems that enable the conversion of renewable feedstocks into valuable chemicals with reduced energy input.
